1.name: Gamification and motivation
1.description: Ratings, badges, an internal 'Wall of Honor' to encourage people to improve performance instead of fearing punishment.

2.name: Personal
2.description: The system praises the employee and offers tips for improvement: 'Great that you offered coffee, but don't forget about the combo discount.'

3.name: Setup in just a few minutes
3.description: Simply place the GIDEONE device in the checkout area and register in the system — it's that easy!

4.name: Criteria customization
4.description: You can configure multiple sales scenarios, including key phrases, upsells, promotions, and target products — everything employees should be doing.
